DOC.brief_summary: We wish determine best treatment expulsion lower ureteral stone . Which three major treatment protocols best treatment conservative management ureteral stone ?
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Treatment Study Patients With Lower Ureteral Stones
DOC.detailed_description: The study include 60 patient low ureteral stone . The patient divide three group . The first group administer Alfuzosin ( 10 mg ) . The second group administer combination Alfuzosin ( 10 mg ) Rowatinex ( Pinene 31 % , Camphene 15 % , Anetol 4 % , Borneol 10 % , Cineol 3 % , Fenchenol 4 % , Olive Oil 33 % ) . The third group administer Rowatinex .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis lower ureter ( urinary calculus ) 8mm Must able swallow tablet Sensitivity Alfuzosin Rowatinex Pregnant breastfeed woman Single kidney Obstructing stone Renal failure creatinine 1.8 mg/dl Patients use various alpha blocker Liver failure Fever high 38 C UTI Syncope hypotension Patients treat PDE5 Patients treat inhibitor CYP3A4 Patients refuse participation
